title: Bought Battlecast Xerath - Can't Use
body: So I just bought Battlecast Xerath and it says I haven't unlocked it in champion select. I checked my purchases and it is there.

replies.body:
Hey Manninen!

I'm very sorry to hear about this!  I went ahead and performed an audit of your account after reading your thread.  From this audit, I went ahead and refreshed this content.  To that end, you should now be able to access this skin normally from Champion Selection!

If you are still experiencing issues selecting this skin, please do not hesitate to let me know!
